item.title: Passing the Bechdel Test
item.description:
Listen now (75 min) | I spoke to Rob Henderson about Yellowjackets, Season 1, Episodes 1-6. We’ll release a discussion of Episodes 7-10 in the coming weeks. Usually we do an entire season of a show at once, but this time we thought it would be better to split things up. Those of you who haven’t watched the show but want to follow along can therefore go back, watch the first …

item.title: Can the CHIPS Act bolster Moore's Law?
item.description:
Congress continues to wrangle over the CHIPS for America Act, which would provide $52 billion in subsidies for the domestic production of semiconductors. The bill, seen as a way to reduce America’s reliance on Taiwan, which manufactures an overwhelming portion of the world’s leading-edge chips, is widely popular. As the…

URL: https://infonomena.substack.com/p/can-the-chips-act-bolster-moores?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: History: God’s Eye, Worm’s Eye, & Intermediate Levels, &

item.title: The Biden administration has dropped the ball on vaccine development
item.description:
The development of Covid vaccines in 2020 is one of the most startling accomplishments in human history — in the same league as the moon landing or the Manhattan Project. In record time, scientists, corporations, and governments responded to the threat of a pandemic in real time by developing vaccines before the pandemic was even halfway through. Wide d…

URL: https://noahpinion.substack.com/p/the-biden-administration-has-dropped?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: History: God’s Eye, Worm’s Eye, & Intermediate Levels, &

item.title: Maybe Courses: The Whole Enchilada
item.description:
This is also not a maybe class: it’s on the schedule for Fall 2022, and this is the nearly finished syllabus. I am at the absolute hardest point in course design for me, which is making the last decisions about what to take out in order to get to manageable amounts of reading…
